author: VincentH.NET @ InnoWvate.NET
name: Modern C# 12 multiservice pattern for Orleans 8
description: Solution for a single Microsoft Orleans 8 (micro)service containing one or more logical services

RootNamespace.description:
The prefix (without trailing .) for all project root namespaces in the solution.
Consider using <Company>.<Product|Technology>

Multiservice.description:
The name (without 'Service' suffix) of the multiservice
Consider using [<Product|Technology>]<Team name>
Used in the name of the solution and as suffix for Apis and Contracts assembly names
To add more logical services to an existing multiservice solution, use AddLogicalService.ps1 <name> (or specify --Multiservice .)

Logicalservice.description:
The name (without 'Service' suffix) of the logical service to add to the solution.
Used in the name of the new service project and in new namespaces + classes in the Apis and Contracts projects

manualInstructions.text: Add generated project to solution manually

postActions.description: Add service project reference to Apis project

manualInstructions.text: Manually add a reference to the generated service project in the Apis project
